name: Improved Precise Strike
source: Legacy of the First World pg. 19
text: Your precise timing and smooth teamwork allow you to strike a foe where it hurts.
prerequisites: Dex 13, Precise Strike, base attack bonus +4.
benefit: Whenever you deal additional damage with Precise Strike, you also deal 1 point of bleed damage. This bleed damage does not stack with itself.
text_zh: 你对于时间的精淮把控和娴熟的团队合作让你能够痛击敌人的伤处。
benefit_zh: 当你通过精淮打击造成额外伤害时，你会同时造成1点流血伤害。这个流血伤害不会与自身叠加。
